txt.en: 'That is what I like to hear!'
Higbald
'Take my war-steed, Cíllan. I know he will bear you all to Harwick safely!'
'Farewell, Utred. I pray for a swift victory!'
Langhold
'I bid you welcome, friend of Langhold!'
'Please accept our hospitality, friend of the Mark.'
'Let me see that letter.'
'Higbald, ready the men for the attack. I must speak with my family.'
'Me too, father! I am almost big enough to wield a sword....'
'At once, my lord.'
'My sweet children! I would not let you risk your lives for the world.'
'Cíllan....'
'The riders of Langhold will protect this city or die trying. That is our duty.'
'Yes, my love, I know. I will bring our folk to Harwick and seek shelter there.'
'But who will look after the other children while the men defend the town?'
'You need not fear for the safety of Langhold's women and children!'
'You can count on us, father!'
'I'll protect them too!'
'Father, let me stay and fight with you!'
